names.international: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
names.japanese: ゼルダの伝説　ブレス オブ ザ ワイルド
names.twitch: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

categories.name: Any%
categories.rules:
** Any% Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation)

categories.name: Bug Limit Categories
categories.rules:
**Bug Limit Definition:**
 
Allowed tricks:
* Whistle Sprinting
* Shield Jumping to gain distance or height
* Infinite Horse Stamina
* Cryonis Jump
* Cancelling attack animations
* Cancelling fall damage by swapping equipment
* Abusing stasis to gain distance or momentum without taking knockback from the object (e.g. Rocket Launch, Box Jump, Box Walking)
* Abusing Ragdoll physics to skip puzzles (e.g. Ragdoll Boost, Ragdoll Jump, avoiding knockback with Ragdoll Glitch)
* Removing burn damage temporarily with a spin attack, also known as Burn Timer Reset
* Stunlocking Calamity
 
Banned tricks:
* Using stasis on an object to knockback Link for the purpose of gaining horizontal or vertical momentum, Bomb Boosting, or any other form of Damage Boosting
* Abusing bullet time to modify Link's speed value
* Damaging a boss mid cutscene (eg. Windblight and Calamity Skip)
* Clipping through solid objects or collision
* Resetting stasis cooldown to chain multiple stasis tricks mid-air, also known as Stasis Reset
* Gravity Launch
* Stasis Bounce
* Flying Machine
* Weapon Smuggling
* Apparatus Glitch
* Skew Glitch
* Moon Jump
* Shrine Coordinate Warp
* Camera Displacement
* Minigame Storage
* Menu Overload
* Dynamic Object Glitch
* Obtain compendium pictures by selling items in Hateno
* Wall Jumps
* Bow Spinning
* Daruk's Perfect Parry
* Golden Gauntlets
* Shield Block Reset
 
Note: There are many glitches and tricks in BotW and not everything is included. If a trick is not mentioned here, you may ask first if it's allowed or not before using it in a run.
 
**Category Specific Rules:**
* Refer to the respective category for rules, objectives and DLC usage.

categories.name: Best Ending
categories.rules:
** Best Ending Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Must gather all 13 Memories and be able to watch the special ending.
* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation).

**DLC Rules**

Original DLC disallows the usage of Chamption's Ballad DLC items/bonuses. 

If you have DLC installed, you can use the following conditions to start your timer early, to counteract DLC cutscenes:

-  –45 seconds for the Master Trials cutscene.
Condition 1: Must not be in Master Mode.
Condition 2: Cannot use any chests or bonuses from the Master Trials

- –52 seconds for the Champions' Ballad cutscene.

8105oe2q.label: Original
8105oe2q.rules:
** All Dungeons (Original) Rules:**
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Complete all 4 Divine Beasts and obtain their corresponding Champion abilities:
 - Divine Beast Vah Medoh (Revali's Gale)
 - Divine Beast Vah Naboris (Urbosa's Fury)
 - Divine Beast Vah Ruta (Mipha's Grace)
 - Divine Beast Vah Rudania (Daruk's Protection)
* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation).

**DLC Rules**

Original DLC disallows the usage of Champion's Ballad DLC items/bonuses. 

If you have DLC installed, you can use the following conditions to start your timer early, to counteract DLC cutscenes:

-  –45 seconds for the Master Trials cutscene.
Condition 1: Must not be in Master Mode.
Condition 2: Cannot use any chests or bonuses from the Master Trials

- –52 seconds for the Champions' Ballad cutscene.

9qjz6y31.label: Extended
9qjz6y31.rules:
** All Dungeons (Extended) Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Complete all dungeons and obtain their corresponding reward:
 - Divine Beast Vah Medoh (Revali's Gale)
 - Divine Beast Vah Naboris (Urbosa's Fury)
 - Divine Beast Vah Ruta (Mipha's Grace)
 - Divine Beast Vah Rudania (Daruk's Protection)
 - Divine Trial (Master Cycle Zero)
* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation).

jq649kj1.label: Original
jq649kj1.rules:
** All Main Quests (Original) Rules: **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Complete the following Main Quests before initiating the final battle with Dark Beast Ganon:
 - Follow The Sheikah Slate
 - The Isolated Plateau
 - Seek Out Impa
 - Find the Fairy Fountain
 - Locked Mementos
 - Free the Divine Beasts
 - Reach Zora’s Domain
 - Divine Beast Vah Ruta
 - Divine Beast Vah Rudania
 - Divine Beast Vah Medoh
 - Forbidden City Entry
 - Divine Beast Vah Naboris
 - The Hero's Sword
 - Captured Memories
* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation).

**DLC Rules**

Original DLC disallows the usage of Champion's Ballad DLC items/bonuses. 

If you have DLC installed, you can use the following conditions to start your timer early, to counteract DLC cutscenes:

-  –45 seconds for the Master Trials cutscene.
Condition 1: Must not be in Master Mode.
Condition 2: Cannot use any chests or bonuses from the Master Trials

- –52 seconds for the Champions' Ballad cutscene.

5lmxrjm1.label: Extended
5lmxrjm1.rules:
** All Main Quests (Extended) Rules: **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Complete the following Main Quests before initiating the final battle with Dark Beast Ganon:
 - Follow The Sheikah Slate
 - The Isolated Plateau
 - Seek Out Impa
 - Find the Fairy Fountain
 - Locked Mementos
 - Free the Divine Beasts
 - Reach Zora’s Domain
 - Divine Beast Vah Ruta
 - Divine Beast Vah Rudania
 - Divine Beast Vah Medoh
 - Forbidden City Entry
 - Divine Beast Vah Naboris
 - The Hero's Sword
 - Captured Memories
* DLC Specific Quests
 - EX The Champions' Ballad
 - EX Champion Mipha's Song
 - EX Champion Daruk's Song
 - EX Champion Revali's Song
 - EX Champion Urbosa's Song
 - The Divine Trial
* Usage of any and all DLC items is permitted. 
* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation).

81wmvovq.label: Original
81wmvovq.rules:
** All Shrines (Original) Rules: **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Complete all 120 shrines in any order.
* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation).

**DLC Rules**

Original DLC disallows the usage of Champion's Ballad DLC items/bonuses. 

If you have DLC installed, you can use the following conditions to start your timer early, to counteract DLC cutscenes:

-  –45 seconds for the Master Trials cutscene.
Condition 1: Must not be in Master Mode.
Condition 2: Cannot use any chests or bonuses from the Master Trials

- –52 seconds for the Champions' Ballad cutscene.

zqoy8ox1.label: Extended
zqoy8ox1.rules:
** All Shrines (Extended) Rules: **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Complete all 120 shrines from the base game and all the extra 16 shrines from the Champions' Ballad DLC in any order.
* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation).

013vo7xl.label: Original
013vo7xl.rules:
** 100% (Original) Rules **
* DLC must be uninstalled.
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Goals below should be completed **before** ending the run.
* Timing ends either when: 1. input that causes the final key item to appear on screen or final reward from the last active side quest; 2. input that causes final cutscene to trigger be it the cutscene for the Final Memory or the final armor upgrade cutscene; 3. last location for 100% Map Meter shows onscreen;

**Sleep Breaks Rules:**
* Runners are allowed to pause the timer and have a break from the run.
* Maximum 3 breaks within an 18 hour pool.
* After the 30 hour mark, and every 10 hours after, the runner will be given 1 extra break and 9 hours added to their pool.

**100% Definition:**
* All container upgrades
 - All 120 Spirit Orbs from Shrines
 - All heart containers from Divine Beasts
* Complete the Adventure Log
 - 15 Main Quests (Beast Ganon must be killed at some point)
 - 42 Shrine quests
 - 76 Side Quests
 - Xenoblade Quest
 - Obtain all 18 memories
* 100.00% map percentage counter
 - All individual 900 Koroks from their source
 - All Locations
 - All Shrines
 - All Towers
* All Key Items
 - Shiekah Slate+ with all runes upgraded
 - Paraglider
 - All Champion abilities
 - All Kilton medals (Kill all 40 Hinox, 40 Talus and 4 Molduga)
 - All horse bridles and saddles
 - Hestu's Gift (given after retrieving all 900 Koroks and fully expanding your inventory)
 - Confidential Envelope (received after completing your Compendium)
* All Permanent Weapons (currently only Master Sword)
* All Permanent Fully Upgraded Armor
 - Champion's Tunic ☆☆☆☆
 - Zora Helm ☆☆☆☆
 - Zora Armor ☆☆☆☆
 - Zora Greaves ☆☆☆☆
 - Cap of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
 - Tunic of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
 - Trousers of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
 - Thunder Helm

rqv4ko6q.label: Extended
rqv4ko6q.rules:
** 100% (Extended) Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Goals below should be completed **before** ending the run.
* Timing ends either when: 1. input that causes the final key item to appear on screen or final reward from the last active side quest; 2. input that causes final cutscene to trigger be it the cutscene for the Final Memory or the final armor upgrade cutscene; 3. last location for 100% Map Meter shows onscreen; 4. interacting with the final monk on Trial of the Sword; or 4. final hit to Maz Koshia.

**Sleep Breaks Rules:**
* Runners are allowed to pause the timer and have a break from the run.
* Maximum 3 breaks within an 18 hour pool.
* After the 30 hour mark, and every 10 hours after, the runner will be given 1 extra break and 9 hours added to their pool.

**100% Extended Definition:**
* All container upgrades
 - All 124 Spirit Orbs from Shrines
 - All heart containers from Divine Beasts
* Complete the Adventure Log
 - 15 Main Quests (Beast Ganon must be killed at some point)
 - 20 EX Main Quests
 - 42 Shrine quests
 - 76 Side Quests
 - Xenoblade Quest
 - 90 EX Side Quests
 - Obtain all 23 memories
* 100.00% map percentage counter
 - All individual 900 Koroks from their source
 - All Locations
 - All Shrines
 - All Towers
* All Key Items
 - Shiekah Slate+ with all runes upgraded
 - Paraglider
 - All Champion abilities
 - All Kilton medals (Kill all 40 Hinox, 40 Talus and 4 Molduga)
 - All horse bridles and saddles
 - Hestu's Gift (given after retrieving all 900 Koroks and fully expanding your inventory)
 - Confidential Envelope (received after completing your Compendium)
* All Permanent Weapons
 - Fully Upgraded Master Sword (must complete Trial of the Sword)
* All Permanent Fully Upgraded Armor
 - Champion's Tunic ☆☆☆☆
 - Zora Helm ☆☆☆☆
 - Zora Armor ☆☆☆☆
 - Zora Greaves ☆☆☆☆
 - Cap of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
 - Tunic of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
 - Trousers of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
 - Thunder Helm
* Complete the Divine Trial and get the Master Cycle Zero

9qj4ww0q.label: Original
9qj4ww0q.rules:
** Master Sword (Original) Rules: **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Timing ends on the first frame when Link pulls the Master Sword out of the pedestal
* OR when the Master Sword item textbox is fully displayed (No Restrictions only).

**DLC Rules**

Original DLC disallows the usage of Champion's Ballad DLC items/bonuses. 

If you have DLC installed, you can use the following conditions to start your timer early, to counteract DLC cutscenes:

-  –45 seconds for the Master Trials cutscene.
Condition 1: Must not be in Master Mode.
Condition 2: Cannot use any chests or bonuses from the Master Trials

- –52 seconds for the Champions' Ballad cutscene.

jq6xyynq.label: Extended
jq6xyynq.rules:
** Master Sword (Extended) Rules: **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* The Master Sword must be fully upgraded and Trial of the Sword must be completed.
* Timing ends when interacting with the final monk pedestal.

5lek6zkl.label: Original
5lek6zkl.rules:
** Master Sword and Dungeons (Original) Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Obtain the Master Sword.
* Complete all 4 Divine Beasts and obtain their corresponding Champion abilities:
 - Divine Beast Vah Medoh (Revali's Gale)
 - Divine Beast Vah Naboris (Urbosa's Fury)
 - Divine Beast Vah Ruta (Mipha's Grace)
 - Divine Beast Vah Rudania (Daruk's Protection)
* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation)

**DLC Rules**

Original DLC disallows the usage of Champion's Ballad DLC items/bonuses. 

If you have DLC installed, you can use the following conditions to start your timer early, to counteract DLC cutscenes:

-  –45 seconds for the Master Trials cutscene.
Condition 1: Must not be in Master Mode.
Condition 2: Cannot use any chests or bonuses from the Master Trials

- –52 seconds for the Champions' Ballad cutscene.

0q5o9z21.label: Extended
0q5o9z21.rules:
** Master Sword and Dungeons (Extended) Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Obtain the Master Sword.
* Complete all dungeons and obtain their corresponding reward:
 - Divine Beast Vah Medoh (Revali's Gale)
 - Divine Beast Vah Naboris (Urbosa's Fury)
 - Divine Beast Vah Ruta (Mipha's Grace)
 - Divine Beast Vah Rudania (Daruk's Protection)
 - Divine Trial (Master Cycle Zero)
* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation).

21gjnr81.label: DLC
21gjnr81.rules:
**Great Plateau (DLC) 100% Rules: **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* The following goals should be completed **before** ending the run.
 -  Get the Sheikah Slate
 -  Activate Great Plateau Tower
 - Get all available armor (Old Shirt, Well-Worn Trousers, Hylian Trousers, Warm Doublet, Nintendo Switch Shirt)
 -  Trade 1 container for 4 Spirit Orbs
 -  Obtain all Sheikah Slate Runes
 -  Defeat the Stone Talus
 -  Collect all 15 available Koroks Seeds
* Timing ends once the Paraglider is completely displayed on screen (when the confirmation arrow is shown on the dialogue box).

gq7n5ed1.label: No DLC
gq7n5ed1.rules:
**Great Plateau (No DLC) 100% Rules: **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* The following goals should be completed **before** ending the run.
 -  Get the Sheikah Slate
 -  Activate Great Plateau Tower
 - Get all available armor (Old Shirt, Well-Worn Trousers, Hylian Trousers, Warm Doublet)
 -  Trade 1 container for 4 Spirit Orbs
 -  Obtain all Sheikah Slate Runes
 -  Defeat the Stone Talus
 -  Collect all 15 available Koroks Seeds
* Timing ends once the Paraglider is completely displayed on screen (when the confirmation arrow is shown on the dialogue box).

81we6k91.label: Mounted Obstacle Course
81we6k91.rules: * Must jump over all hurdles and reach the finish

gq7gvnrq.label: Restricted
gq7gvnrq.rules:
** General IL Rules: **
* Game version must be the latest available (currently Ver. 1.5.0 for Wii U and Ver. 1.6.0 for Switch)
* All homebrew applications are banned, except for BotwRuns v1.0 found in the resources section.
* Video proof is required.
* Any preparation is allowed (unless specified). This includes, but is not limited to, entering with:
Attack, Defense, or Speed boosts, Bonus Hearts, Bonus Stamina, “Moonjump”, “Skew”.

** Restricted Any% Rules: ** 
* Timing starts from the fadeout after placing the sword in the pedestal.
* Timing ends once you press A to pick up the Master Sword from the Final Trials.
* The Trials must be completed in the order of Beginning Trials then Middle Trials then Final Trials.
* Runners must complete each floor in order by defeating the enemies and entering the warp pad. 

** No Major Glitches Rules **
* Do not submit to this subcategory.

** 100% Rules **
* Same as Any%
* Must open all chests and obtain the item within. Destroying chests is allowed as long as the item is collected.

xqk8gr4q.label: Unrestricted
xqk8gr4q.rules:
** General IL Rules: **
* Game version must be the latest available (currently Ver. 1.5.0 for Wii U and Ver. 1.6.0 for Switch)
* All homebrew applications are banned, except for BotwRuns v1.0 found in the resources section.
* Video proof is required.
* Any preparation is allowed (unless specified). This includes, but is not limited to, entering with:
Attack, Defense, or Speed boosts, Bonus Hearts, Bonus Stamina, “Moonjump”, “Skew”.

** Unrestricted Any% Rules: ** 
* Timing starts from the fadeout after placing the sword in the pedestal.
* Timing ends once you press A to pick up the Master Sword from the third Trials.
* The Trials can be completed in any order the runner prefers so long as they complete the Beginning Trials, Middle Trials, and Final Trials in succession.

** No Major Glitches Rules **
* Do not submit to this subcategory.

** 100% Rules **
* Same as Any%
* Must open all chests and obtain the item within. Destroying chests is allowed as long as the item is collected.
* Chests and items obtained from Trials other than the one entered still count toward completion.

21dyvdg1.label: No Limit
21dyvdg1.rules:
** Great Plateau Any% Rules: **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* amiibo usage is allowed
* Timing ends once the Paraglider is completely displayed on screen (when the confirmation arrow is shown on the dialogue box).

5q802z61.label: Bug Limit
5q802z61.rules:
** Great Plateau Any% Rules: **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* amiibo usage is allowed
* Timing ends once the Paraglider is completely displayed on screen (when the confirmation arrow is shown on the dialogue box).

**Bug Limit Definition:**
 
Allowed tricks:
* Whistle Sprinting
* Shield Jumping to gain distance or height
* Infinite Horse Stamina
* Cryonis Jump
* Cancelling attack animations
* Cancelling fall damage by swapping equipment
* Abusing stasis to gain distance or momentum without taking knockback from the object (e.g. Rocket Launch, Box Jump, Box Walking)
* Abusing Ragdoll physics to skip puzzles (e.g. Ragdoll Boost, Ragdoll Jump, avoiding knockback with Ragdoll Glitch)
* Removing burn damage temporarily with a spin attack, also known as Burn Timer Reset
* Stunlocking Calamity
 
Banned tricks:
* Using stasis on an object to knockback Link for the purpose of gaining horizontal or vertical momentum, Bomb Boosting, or any other form of Damage Boosting
* Abusing bullet time to modify Link's speed value
* Damaging a boss mid cutscene (eg. Windblight and Calamity Skip)
* Clipping through solid objects or collision
* Resetting stasis cooldown to chain multiple stasis tricks mid-air, also known as Stasis Reset
* Gravity Launch
* Stasis Bounce
* Flying Machine
* Weapon Smuggling
* Apparatus Glitch
* Skew Glitch
* Moon Jump
* Shrine Coordinate Warp
* Camera Displacement
* Minigame Storage
* Menu Overload
* Dynamic Object Glitch
* Obtain compendium pictures by selling items in Hateno
* Wall Jumps
* Bow Spinning
* Daruk's Perfect Parry
* Golden Gauntlets
* Shield Block Reset
 
Note: There are many glitches and tricks in BotW and not everything is included. If a trick is not mentioned here, you may ask first if it's allowed or not before using it in a run.

0q5g80nl.label: Restricted
0q5g80nl.rules:
** Master Sword Restricted Rules: **
* Master Sword must be obtained in Korok Forest from its original source.
* You must complete "The Hero's Sword" main quest.
* Any and all vessel upgrades have an added source requirement.  This means that said upgrades must originate from spirit orbs collected from shrines during the run, or from the heart containers within divine beasts.

8147dnj1.label: Restricted
8147dnj1.rules:
** Restrictions **

* Master Sword must be obtained in Korok Forest from its original source.
* Any and all vessel upgrades have an added source requirement.  This means that said upgrades must originate from spirit orbs collected from shrines during the run, or from the heart containers within divine beasts.

p12xz8kl.label: Restricted
p12xz8kl.rules:
** Master Sword and Dungeons Rules: **
* Master Sword must be obtained in Korok Forest from its original source.
* You must complete "The Hero's Sword" main quest.
* Any and all vessel upgrades have an added source requirement.  This means that said upgrades must originate from spirit orbs collected from shrines during the run, or from the heart containers within divine beasts.

4lxr334l.label: Restricted
4lxr334l.rules:
** All Shrines Restricted Rules: **
* Every shrine must be entered via the elevator associated with that shrine.

names.international: Breath of The Wild Category Extensions
names.japanese: ゼルダの伝説　ブレス オブ ザ ワイルド
names.twitch: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

categories.name: All Dog Treasures
categories.rules:
** General Rules: **
* Game version must be the latest available (currently Ver. 1.5.0 for Wii U and Ver. 1.6.0 for Switch)
* All homebrew applications are banned, except for BotwRuns v1.0 found in the resources section.
* Any glitch that persists throughout save files or new game must be removed before the run.
* Video proof is required. The video must start from the Main Menu and the game version must be visible from the bottom right corner of the screen.

** amiibo Rules **
* Having the amiibo rune active is allowed in no amiibo runs.

** All Dog Treasures Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* You must open all 16 dog treasure chests.
* Timings ends when the last chest item is displayed on screen.

categories.name: All Kass Quests
categories.rules:
** General Rules: **
* Game version must be the latest available (currently Ver. 1.5.0 for Wii U and Ver. 1.6.0 for Switch)
* All homebrew applications are banned, except for BotwRuns v1.0 found in the resources section.
* Any glitch that persists throughout save files or new game must be removed before the run.
* Video proof is required. The video must start from the Main Menu and the game version must be visible from the bottom right corner of the screen.

** amiibo Rules **
* Having the amiibo rune active is allowed in no amiibo runs.

categories.name: All Kilton Medals
categories.rules:
** General Rules: **
* Game version must be the latest available (currently Ver. 1.5.0 for Wii U and Ver. 1.6.0 for Switch)
* All homebrew applications are banned, except for BotwRuns v1.0 found in the resources section.
* Any glitch that persists throughout save files or new game must be removed before the run.
* Video proof is required. The video must start from the Main Menu and the game version must be visible from the bottom right corner of the screen.

** amiibo Rules **
* Having the amiibo rune active is allowed in no amiibo runs.

** All Kilton Medals Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* You must obtain every Kilton Medal by killing the overworld bosses.
* Timing ends when the last Medal of Honor is obtained.

categories.name: All Minigames
categories.rules:
** General Rules: **
* Game version must be the latest available (currently Ver. 1.5.0 for Wii U and Ver. 1.6.0 for Switch)
* All homebrew applications are banned, except for BotwRuns v1.0 found in the resources section.
* Any glitch that persists throughout save files or new game must be removed before the run.
* Video proof is required. The video must start from the Main Menu and the game version must be visible from the bottom right corner of the screen.

** amiibo Rules **
* Having the amiibo rune active is allowed in no amiibo runs.

** All Minigames Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Win all of the maximum rewards for the minigames listed below. Timing ends on earning the last reward.

- Bird-Man Research Study
- Boom Bam Golf
- Blue Flame
- Deer Hunting
- Flight Range
- Footrace
- Gambling
- Ice Delivery (second time)
- Mounted Archery Course
- Mounted Obstacle Course
- Paraglider Course
- Sand-Seal Racing (second time)
- Shield Surfing (Basic)
- Shield Surfing (Advanced)
- Snowball Bowling
- Gut Check Challenge
- Super Gut Check Challenge
- Test of Wood (second time)

categories.name: All Lynels
categories.rules:
** General Rules: **
* Game version must be the latest available (currently Ver. 1.5.0 for Wii U and Ver. 1.6.0 for Switch)
* All homebrew applications are banned, except for BotwRuns v1.0 found in the resources section.
* Any glitch that persists throughout save files or new game must be removed before the run.
* Video proof is required. The video must start from the Main Menu and the game version must be visible from the bottom right corner of the screen.

** amiibo Rules **
* Having the amiibo rune active is allowed in no amiibo runs.

** All Lynels Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* You must defeat all 22 Lynels on the overworld (does not include Trial of the Sword Lynel).
* Master Mode runs must also defeat the Lynel in Great Plateau.
* Timing ends on the last hit to the final Lynel.

* All homebrew applications are banned, except for BotwRuns v1.0 found in the resources section.
* Any glitch that persists throughout save files or new game must be removed before the run.

* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Timing ends once you see the text for "Complete map of Hyrule extracted" after activating all towers.

categories.name: Bread%
categories.rules:
** General Rules: **
* Game version must be the latest available (currently Ver. 1.5.0 for Wii U and Ver. 1.6.0 for Switch)
* All homebrew applications are banned, except for BotwRuns v1.0 found in the resources section.
* Any glitch that persists throughout save files or new game must be removed before the run.
* Video proof is required. The video must start from the Main Menu and the game version must be visible from the bottom right corner of the screen.

** amiibo Rules **
* Having the amiibo rune active is allowed in no amiibo runs.

**Bread% Rules**
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Timing ends when the arrow of the textbox appears after cooking the bread

**Bread% Definition**
Cook a bread as fast as possible

categories.name: Champion%
categories.rules:
** General Rules: **
* Game version must be the latest available (currently Ver. 1.5.0 for Wii U and Ver. 1.6.0 for Switch)
* All homebrew applications are banned, except for BotwRuns v1.0 found in the resources section.

**Champion% Rules**
* Runs must start from New Game.
*Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation)
* You must obtain the Master Sword, Champion's Tunic, Hylian Shield and Hylian Trousers before defeating Ganon

*Can be done with restricted or unrestricted rules for Master Sword obtainment.

**Master Sword Restricted Rules**
* Master Sword must be obtained in Korok Forest from its original source.
* You must complete "The Hero's Sword" main quest.
* Any and all vessel upgrades have an added source requirement. This means that said upgrades must originate from spirit orbs collected from shrines during the run, or from the heart containers within divine beasts.

* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Timing ends when Link loses all health.

** Damageless Rules **
* Cannot take damage (heart count can't be lowered by a quarter or more).
* Reloading a save after taking damage is not allowed.
* However, reloading a save before an instance where damage would be taken is allowed.

* Timing ends on the first frame of the whistle.

**Shrine Collection Rules**
* Timer starts when getting control of Link
* Timer stops when interacting with the last monk
* Every shrines of the region must be completed

**Shrine Collection Definition**
* The goal of each category of shrine collection is to complete every shrine in a given tower region.

categories.name: Marriage%
categories.rules:
** General Rules: **
* Game version must be the latest available (currently Ver. 1.5.0 for Wii U and Ver. 1.6.0 for Switch)

** Marriage% **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Reach the wedding cutscene in Tarrey Town.
* Timing ends when the fadeout starts after Hudson says "Then let's join the gathering".

categories.name: 100% (Dupe Glitch)
categories.rules:
** General Rules: **
* All homebrew applications are banned, except for BotwRuns v1.0 found in the resources section.
* Any glitch that persists throughout save files or new game must be removed before the run.
* Video proof is required. The video must start from the Main Menu and the game version must be visible from the bottom right corner of the screen.

** amiibo Rules **
* Having the amiibo rune active is allowed in no amiibo runs.

** 100% Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Goals below should be completed **before** ending the run.
* Timing ends either when: 1. input that causes the final key item to appear on screen or final reward from the last active side quest; 2. input that causes final cutscene to trigger be it the cutscene for the Final Memory or the final armor upgrade cutscene; 3. last location for 100% Map Meter shows onscreen;

**Sleep Breaks Rules:**
* Runners are allowed to pause the timer and have a break from the run.
* Maximum 2 breaks within an 18 hour pool.
* After the 30 hour mark, and every 10 hours after, the runner will be given 1 extra break and 9 hours added to their pool.

**100% Definition:**
* All container upgrades
- All 120 Spirit Orbs from Shrines
- All heart containers from Divine Beasts
* Complete the Adventure Log
- 15 Main Quests (Beast Ganon must be killed at some point)
- 42 Shrine quests
- 76 Side Quests
- Obtain all 18 memories
* 100.00% map percentage counter
- All individual 900 Koroks from their source
- All Locations
- All Shrines
- All Towers
* All Key Items
- Shiekah Slate+ with all runes upgraded
- Paraglider
- All Champion abilities
- All Kilton medals (Kill all 40 Hinox, 40 Talus and 4 Molduga)
- All horse bridles and saddles
- Hestu's Gift (given after retrieving all 900 Koroks and fully expanding your inventory)
- Confidential Envelope (received after completing your Compendium)
* All Permanent Weapons
- Master Sword
* All Permanent Fully Upgraded Armor
- Champion's Tunic ☆☆☆☆
- Zora Helm ☆☆☆☆
- Zora Armor ☆☆☆☆
- Zora Greaves ☆☆☆☆
- Cap of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
- Tunic of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
- Trousers of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
- Thunder Helm

* Throw/Drop either a Farming Hoe or a Farmer’s pitchfork in any body of water with the word “Lake” in its name. The rake must be seen entering the body of water.

Lord of the Mountain
Giant Horse
Royal Horse
Any Normal Horse
Any Bear
Buck (Male Deer)
Doe (Female Deer)
StalHorse
Any Lynel (Simply mounting is okay since not tamable)
Teba
Sidon

z194jekl.label: Original
z194jekl.rules:
** All Kass Quests Original Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Timing ends when the last Kass song in Rito Village ends.

Complete the following quests

- The Two Rings
- The Crowned Beast
- Master of the Wind
- The Hero's Cache
- Song of Storms
- The Forest Dragons Jaws
- Sign of the Shadow
- Under a Blood Moon

p1256jk1.rules:
** All Kass Quests Extended Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.

Complete the following quests

- The Crowned Beast
- Master of the Wind
- The Hero's Cache
- Song of Storms
- The Forest Dragons Jaws
- Sign of the Shadow
- Under a Blood Moon

* Additionally, you must complete the Champions' Ballad Main Quest.

814x50jq.label: Original
814x50jq.rules:
** Master Sword, Dungeons and Towers Original Rules**
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Obtain the Master Sword.
* Activate all towers
* Complete all 4 Divine Beasts and obtain their corresponding Champion abilities:

Divine Beast Vah Medoh - Revali's Gale
Divine Beast Vah Naboris - Urbosa's Fury
Divine Beast Vah Ruta - Mipha's Grace
Divine Beast Vah Rudania - Daruk's Protection

* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation)

**DLC Rules:**
Original DLC disallows the usage of Chamption's Ballad DLC items/bonuses. 

If you have DLC installed, you can use the following conditions to start your timer early, to counteract DLC cutscenes:

1. –45 seconds for the Master Trials cutscene.
Condition 1: Must not be in Master Mode.
Condition 2: Cannot use any chests or bonuses from the Master Trials

2. –52 seconds for the Champions' Ballad cutscene.

z194jokl.label: Extended
z194jokl.rules:
** Master Sword, Dungeons and Towers Extended Rules **
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Obtain the Master Sword.
* Activate all towers
* Complete all 4 Divine Beasts and the Divine Trial to obtain their respective rewards.

Divine Beast Vah Medoh - Revali's Gale
Divine Beast Vah Naboris - Urbosa's Fury
Divine Beast Vah Ruta - Mipha's Grace
Divine Beast Vah Rudania - Daruk's Protection
Divine Trial - Master Cycle Zero

* Timing ends when the last arrow makes contact with Dark Beast Ganon (first frame of the explosion animation).

** General Rules: **

* You may (if desired) redeem your seeds for inventory slots with Hestu. The seed count on the final seed would then be minus the redeemed seeds.

mln3d9oq.label: Bug Limit
mln3d9oq.rules:
**Bug Limit Definition:**
 
Allowed tricks:
* Whistle Sprinting
* Shield Jumping to gain distance or height
* Infinite Horse Stamina
* Cryonis Jump
* Cancelling attack animations
* Cancelling fall damage by swapping equipment
* Abusing stasis to gain distance or momentum without taking knockback from the object (e.g. Rocket Launch, Box Jump, Box Walking)
* Abusing Ragdoll physics to skip puzzles (e.g. Ragdoll Boost, Ragdoll Jump, avoiding knockback with Ragdoll Glitch)
* Removing burn damage temporarily with a spin attack, also known as Burn Timer Reset
* Stunlocking Calamity
 
Banned tricks:
* Using stasis on an object to knockback Link for the purpose of gaining horizontal or vertical momentum, Bomb Boosting, or any other form of Damage Boosting
* Abusing bullet time to modify Link's speed value
* Damaging a boss mid cutscene (eg. Windblight and Calamity Skip)
* Clipping through solid objects or collision
* Resetting stasis cooldown to chain multiple stasis tricks mid-air, also known as Stasis Reset
* Gravity Launch
* Stasis Bounce
* Flying Machine
* Weapon Smuggling
* Apparatus Glitch
* Skew Glitch
* Moon Jump
* Shrine Coordinate Warp
* Camera Displacement
* Minigame Storage
* Menu Overload
* Dynamic Object Glitch
* Obtain compendium pictures by selling items in Hateno
* Wall Jumps
* Bow Spinning
* Daruk's Perfect Parry
* Golden Gauntlets
* Shield Block Reset
 
Note: There are many glitches and tricks in BotW and not everything is included. If a trick is not mentioned here, you may ask first if it's allowed or not before using it in a run.
 
**Category Specific Rules:**
* Refer to the respective category for rules, objectives and DLC usage.

814j45w1.label: Original
814j45w1.rules:
**100% (Original) Rules**

* DLC must be uninstalled.
* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Goals below should be completed before ending the run.
* Timing ends either when: 1. input that causes the final key item to appear on screen or final reward from the last active side quest; 2. input that causes final cutscene to trigger be it the cutscene for the Final Memory or the final armor upgrade cutscene; 3. last location for * 100% Map Meter shows onscreen;

**Sleep Breaks Rules:**

* Runners are allowed to pause the timer and have a break from the run.
* Maximum 3 breaks within an 18 hour pool.
* After the 30 hour mark, and every 10 hours after, the runner will be given 1 extra break and 9 hours added to their pool.

**100% Definition:**

* All container upgrades
 * All 120 Spirit Orbs from Shrines
 * All heart containers from Divine Beasts
* Complete the Adventure Log
 * 15 Main Quests (Beast Ganon must be killed at some point)
 * 42 Shrine quests
 * 76 Side Quests
 * Xenoblade Quest
 * Obtain all 18 memories
* 100.00% map percentage counter
 * All individual 900 Koroks from their source
 * All Locations
 * All Shrines
 * All Towers
* All Key Items
 * Shiekah Slate+ with all runes upgraded
 * Paraglider
 * All Champion abilities
 * All Kilton medals (Kill all 40 Hinox, 40 Talus and 4 Molduga)
 * All horse bridles and saddles
 * Hestu's Gift (given after retrieving all 900 Koroks and fully expanding your inventory)
 * Confidential Envelope (received after completing your Compendium)
* All Permanent Weapons (currently only Master Sword)
* All Permanent Fully Upgraded Armor
 * Champion's Tunic ☆☆☆☆
 * Zora Helm ☆☆☆☆
 * Zora Armor ☆☆☆☆
 * Zora Greaves ☆☆☆☆
 * Cap of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
 * Tunic of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
 * Trousers of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
 * Thunder Helm

z193d2j1.label: Extended
z193d2j1.rules:
**100% (Extended) Rules**

* Runs must start from New Game.
* Timing starts when gaining control of Link.
* Goals below should be completed before ending the run.
* Timing ends either when: 1. input that causes the final key item to appear on screen or final reward from the last active side quest; 2. input that causes final cutscene to trigger be it the cutscene for the Final Memory or the final armor upgrade cutscene; 3. last location for 100% Map Meter shows onscreen; 4. interacting with the final monk on Trial of the Sword; or 4. final hit to Maz Koshia.

**Sleep Breaks Rules:**

* Runners are allowed to pause the timer and have a break from the run.
* Maximum 3 breaks within an 18 hour pool.
* After the 30 hour mark, and every 10 hours after, the runner will be given 1 extra break and 9 hours added to their pool.

**100% Extended Definition:**

* All container upgrades
 * All 124 Spirit Orbs from Shrines
 * All heart containers from Divine Beasts
* Complete the Adventure Log
 * 15 Main Quests (Beast Ganon must be 
 * killed at some point)
 * 20 EX Main Quests
 * 42 Shrine quests
 * 76 Side Quests
 * Xenoblade Quest
 * 90 EX Side Quests
 * Obtain all 23 memories
* 100.00% map percentage counter
 * All individual 900 Koroks from their source
 * All Locations
 * All Shrines
 * All Towers
* All Key Items
 * Shiekah Slate+ with all runes upgraded
 * Paraglider
 * All Champion abilities
 * All Kilton medals (Kill all 40 Hinox, 40 Talus and 4 Molduga)
 * All horse bridles and saddles
 * Hestu's Gift (given after retrieving all 900 Koroks and fully expanding your inventory)
 * Confidential Envelope (received after completing your Compendium)
* All Permanent Weapons
 * Fully Upgraded Master Sword (must complete Trial of the Sword)
* All Permanent Fully Upgraded Armor
 * Champion's Tunic ☆☆☆☆
 * Zora Helm ☆☆☆☆
 * Zora Armor ☆☆☆☆
 * Zora Greaves ☆☆☆☆
 * Cap of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
 * Tunic of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
 * Trousers of the Wild ☆☆☆☆
 * Thunder Helm
* Complete the Divine Trial and get the Master Cycle Zero
